text: Yaroslavsky () is an urban locality (an urban-type settlement) in Khorolsky District of Primorsky Krai, Russia, located southeast of the district's administrative center of Khorol. Population: ==History== It was founded in 1951 and was granted urban-type settlement status in 1957. ==Economy== Yaroslavsky Ore Mining and Processing Enterprise is the backbone of the settlement's industry and economy. There is also a rural construction enterprise. ==References== Category:Urban-type settlements in Primorsky Krai Category:Monotowns in Russia
title: Yaroslavsky, Primorsky Krai
